name: DeathRun Mobile
description:
DeathRun is a rogue-lite, metroidvania inspired, action-platformer. You'll explore a sprawling, ever-changing castle... assuming you’re able to fight your way past its keepers in 3D souls-lite combat. No checkpoints. Kill, die, learn, repeat.
No run will be the same. The game is a constant sequence of trial that's accompanied by addictive fast pace gameplay, beautiful 3D graphics and a diverse pool of different playstyles. Somewhat challenging at first but when you do a couple of runs and get the gist of the game, it'll become much easier.
